data.actual_result: Some languages only show the thousands separator for the online members or neither of them.
data.expected_result: You should see some digit grouping (thousands separator) for all languages.
data.short_description: No thousands separator for invites for some languages
data.steps_to_repro: - Send or view an invite of a server with more than 1000 online and offline members (e.g Discord Testers invite) - Change your language to German or French (also works with others) - Observe the invite again and look for thousands separator for the offline and online member count
